1.负责英雄联盟官方APP的产品用户运营，根据游戏节点规划官方APP整体用户运营基调、策略，并根据对应的策略落地执行、监控、分析、总结，通过持续运营提升用户对游戏和社区的价值与粘性；
2.根据端游整体业务发展方向、业务策略及用户核心诉求，持续有效推动官方APP产品形态优化，不断完善产品用户体验；
3.负责英雄联盟游戏日常版本、商业化等节点社区发行，根据对应节点内容、目标规划发行策略、制定发行计划，并最终跟进统筹整体工作事项落地。

RecruitPostName: 资深美术指导（主美）
Responsibility:
1.负责把控游戏整体美术风格，美术实现方案制定，负责最终游戏的视觉效果和品质；

5.负责与美术合作方的沟通与对接，制定美术团队的工作计划、保障项目进度。

RecruitPostName: 游戏图形开发工程师

RecruitPostName: 资深客户端工程师
Responsibility:
1.与内部资深专家共事，解决源源不断的技术难题，做行业最前沿的探索研究；
2.对外部游戏研发团队的技术方案进行把控，对业务的重难点进行方案规划和落实跟进；

4.梳理公司内部及外部技术服务、组件资源、解决方案，整合建立游戏客户端开发全流程解决方案仓库，提升对外服务效能；
5.研究业界项目技术实现方案、常用组件、美术制作标准及前沿技术动向。为项目技术选型，标准制定提供参考。

RecruitPostName: 资深游戏技术美术TA
Responsibility:
1.1能够结合人工智能技术，大幅度提高角色、场景制作相关的产能；
2.对facs等基于肌群驱动的动画方案有较深入的研究，具有开发表情或口型复杂面部绑定的能力，并能将相应的方案在项目中落地，达到较高的品质；
3.能够根据项目需求，配合动画师和程序规划动画资源，制定动画制作规范；系统解决大型动画项目中遇到的技术难点，优化动画流程，提高效率；
4.处理好非人形角色的Gameplay动画，在游戏内有较为真实的表现；
5.对Houdini有比较深入的使用经验，可以在Houdini原生节点无法完成任务时，使用VEX实现算法；搭建PCG管线流程及规范，推动技术美术完善PCG工业化管线建立；
6.了解掌握SubstanceDesginer，能与Houdini的PG生成做好配合。

RecruitPostName: 腾讯游戏高级休闲游戏策划
Responsibility:
1.在深入理解休闲游戏市场和产品的基础上，参与多款创新型中轻度休闲游戏的立项和核心玩法设计，从而构建休闲游戏产品矩阵；
2.独立完成休闲游戏的玩法、战斗、系统、关卡、数值和商业化设计，撰写相关策划案并跟进开发落地；
3.与技术策划深度配合，将上述设计模块化拆解，以便各项目间复用；
4.设计游戏内各项数据打点，并根据线上数据给出针对性的迭代方案，持续优化游戏。

1.您将可能收获：大数据架构、大数据技术、大数据产品及解决方案方面的知识；
2.您将可能成为：有行业视角的大数据解决方案架构师；
3.负责大数据平台、数据仓库/数据湖、数据中台产品解决方案在行业侧客户的设计、推广和落地；
4.进行大数据及数据中台产品的市场推广、调研与客户沟通等工作；
5.协助产品团队收集市场信息、客户需求和用户反馈；
6.工作地点：深圳/广州。

RecruitPostName: 腾讯云能源行业架构师（架构师创造营-专有云方向）
Responsibility:
1.你将可能收获：云计算IAAS、PAAS、安全、分布式云、信创、智算等方面的知识；
2.你将可能成为：有行业视角的专有云产品架构师；
3.根据行业客户的需求构建适合的专有云解决方案。工作中，一方面需要深入研究产品基础云产品的功能和发展路线图，抓住行业趋势构建市场需要的产品组合方案；另一方面将行业客户的需求反馈到各个云产品线，帮助产品路线和功能更好的接轨市场，完成产品的能力建设与营收目标；
4.对不同行业的其他架构师进行专有云解决方案的持续培训和指导，分享最佳实践知识和案例，并在过程中进行方案和文案的优化和更新。

RecruitPostName: 腾讯云泛金融行业架构师（架构师创造营-专有云方向）
Responsibility:
1.你将可能收获：云计算IAAS、PAAS、安全、分布式云、信创、智算等方面的知识；
2.你将可能成为：有行业视角的专有云产品架构师；
3.作为金融云架构师，为泛金融行业客户和合作伙伴提供云服务业务及技术架构咨询服务，根据腾讯云的实际情况，结合行业发展趋势，制定面向泛金融行业的、有竞争力的金融科技解决方案；
4.根据客户业务的需求和理解合作伙伴的需求，基于腾讯金融云的整体架构，输出满足客户需求的服务解决方案；
5.负责泛金融项目的需求分析、方案设计、传统解决方案云化规划设计、应用迁移和数据迁移等设计工作；
6.支持业务团队进行售前工作，并配合相关的售中/售后等相关业务工作；
7.在客户迁云过程中，根据项目本身的需要，协助研发团队或实施团队（客户合作伙伴交付经理）完成Demo系统搭建，PoC测试及最终迁移工作； 负责上云案例、技术方案的更新维护，以及布道工作；
8.工作地点可选择北京、上海、深圳。

RecruitPostName: 腾讯云网络测试开发工程师（西安/武汉/长沙）
Responsibility:
1.你是网络大牛，热衷于专研云网络技术的奥秘；亦或是有技术热情的潜力派，希望揭开云网络的神秘面纱，那么欢迎加入腾讯云网络测试团队，我们致力于腾讯云IAAS层云网络的质量保障工作，为腾讯云提供强大、稳定的网络通讯服务，支撑云上海量业务；
2.在这里，你可以深入接触相关腾讯云网络产品，类如：私有网络、负载均衡、自定义防火墙、专线网络和NAT网关等；
3.在这里，你还可以深入运用并学习相关Overlay网络技术，类如：Vxlan、GRE、L2/L3网络协议、IPSec、NAT原理、OSPF、BGP和ISIS等；
4.在这里，你还可以深入接触Linux下前沿网络流量转发技术，类如：DPDK、OVS、智能网卡、FPGA和P4；
5.在这里，你还可以深度参与腾讯云DevOps流程建设与相关运营工作，并且可以参与设计优化自动化测试框架进行相关自动化测试工作；
6.加入我们，与业内最优秀的同事并肩，成为网络测试大牛，见证云网络技术的发展，创造业务的一个个里程碑；
7.负责腾讯云产品需求和架构分析，测试设计和测试开发工作，包括IaaS层如计算、网络和虚拟化等，包括但不限于功能测试，性能测试，可靠性测试，高可用测试，混沌测试，稳定性测试，用户体验等系统测试工作；
8.对测试方案进行有效的落地和执行，以确保项目进度和质量，形成自动化测试用例并进一步形成服务化提升效率；
9.架构并实现IaaS层如网络、虚拟化等产品自动化测试平台，提升产品测试和交付能力；
10.不断提升测试过程、方法和技术，构建质量评估标准，优化改进措施，提升产品质量和效率；
11.设计、构建并落地各产品自动化构建、测试和发布的工程基础设施和流程优化；
12.注：此岗位位腾讯集团旗下子公司编制。

1.通过用户调研、画像分析等方式，结合电商业务场景，挖掘增长机会点，完成用户、团长增长目标；
2.关注研究行业增长玩法，制定和沉淀增长策略，决策预算及资源分配；
3.根据转化漏斗以及生命周期分析，监测流量质量、促进转化，思考并分析不同拉新渠道特点，降低转化成本；
4.协同产品、技术、数据、商品团队，利用产品能力、商品利益点等多种手段确保增长规模。

RecruitPostName: 消费金融结构化产品管理与策略岗
Responsibility:
1.负责信贷结构化资管产品管理体系的规划与建设，为信托等金融机构提供包括交易结构优化，资产证券化技术服务等解决方案。完善结构化资管产品的发行前、中、后期的全生命周期管理，搭建资管产品的现金流模拟模型、转让定价模型，迭代优化贴合业务实际的管理策略，实现资方/资产池收益与风险的平衡；
2.与前端结构化融资团队进行策略协同，支持对外评级、会计师事务所以及资方的量化分析与沟通，持续协助新机构/存量机构进行量、价、险等各方面的长期合规运营。综合各资方/资产池收益与风险水平明确目标资产组合，从资方/资产池角度提出策略建议。持续监测风险与收益策略的有效性，跟踪评估风险与收益策略效果；
3.负责各资方/资产池信用风险的监测与预警，搭建信贷业务资产质量监控看板。监测客群结构迁移和风险变化，分析及预测各渠道资产质量情况，确保不良率不超过各资方/资产池的风险阈值水平；
4.与数据和模型团队紧密协作，推进资管产品管理能力建设，在数据模型分析的基础上制定和优化⻛险与收益管理相关策略，并持续评估及优化策略效果；
5.为资金渠道和商务团队提供策略支持，协助优化资方/资产池管理的相应策略，与资金运营团队共同建设中台管理能力，达到对渠道量、价、险的综合管控，深化各资方的长期合作价值；
6.提出系统建设的业务需求，与系统产品团队共同建设策略系统化能力。

1.能够有效分析产品内核与玩法内核，筛选并明确目标用户、分析用户诉求、提炼核心卖点，并结合市场环境、产品阶段输出内容营销打法计划；
2.有极强的内容敏感度和统筹内容制作的能力，能通过各类内容方式表达IP/产品魅力、协助IP/产品形成影响力，输出内容方案、需求，并跟进内容制作落地和推广，为内容质量和营销效果负责；
3.能够根据对用户和阶段目标的分析，设计内容自传播方案，并推进游戏内、游戏外资源整合，落地执行；
4.与市场、平台部门协作，根据游戏的测试期上线运营期节点，针对游戏卖点或阶段性主题进行内容营销事件的打造和落地；
5.统筹内容制作和运营、内容制作方/制作者引入、关系维护和原生KOL培养等工作；定期进行阶段性的数据总结和反馈，提炼方法论以适应多项目诉求。

RecruitPostName: 游戏数据分析师
Responsibility:
1.负责腾讯精品手游外部发行的数据分析工作，包括数据体系搭建、数据表现分析、以及用户和市场研究等；
2.负责数据体系搭建，如数据打点、上报和分析系统的搭建等，建立关键指标的日常监控机制，搭建各类专项数据分析框架，依据业务需求输出分析结论；
3.负责市场和用户分析，根据游戏定位，进行目标用户分层，预估市场规模和用户空间，并依据数据分析输出目标用户及阵地结论，支持发行决策；
4.进行竞品监测，保持对核心竞品和新游的关注，监控关键数据表现，为游戏提供方向性指导和参考；
5.对所负责的业务专项承担项目管理职责，把控进度，拉通对接，督促和跟进跨团队协作执行落地。

RecruitPostName: 创新休闲类游戏-游戏运营(项目PM及商业化)
Responsibility:
1.负责游戏国内本发行的统筹工作，包括组件接入、流程管理和合规审核等；
2.负责游戏本地化内容推进，保证本地化内容包括但不限于文字、视觉、社交、活动、世界观包装等在游戏内呈现的质量；
3. 定期输出游戏数据报备、用户画像等，并且能够反哺到各类游戏线上、社区活动、宣传内容的创意；
4. 基于本土用户的游戏反馈，参与游戏运营中包括版本、活动、营销等方面的决策，并对运营结果负责。

RecruitPostName: 腾讯视频IP衍生品企划经理
Responsibility:
1.负责腾讯视频平台自有IP衍生商品（影视剧、综艺为主）的企划和开发策略，对IP项目中衍生品的整体收入负责（包括toC和toB），需要有兼顾用户想法及客户需求的思考能力及应变能力；
2.负责衍生品在各场景的商品组货策略和执行，不断根据数据反馈调整优化策略，可以很好的与运营、产品、设计团队紧密合作，持续提升项目营收效率及最终收入目标；
3.能有IP增值大局观，有效联动内部资源，可以1+1>2的最高效率解决问题，实现业务和部门的效益最大化；
4.能随时了解竞品动向，有主动思考能力，随时思考业务进阶及可开展的新方向；
5.可以有效的沟通，与内部其他团队（会员、渠道）高效协同合作。

RecruitPostName: Head of Content
Responsibility:
Tencent is a world-leading internet and technology company that develops innovative products and services to improve the quality of life of people around the world. Founded in 1998 with its headquarters in Shenzhen China, our guiding principle is to use technology for good. 

We are not only a major video game publisher in the world, we also produce other high-quality digital content, enriching interactive entertainment experiences for people around the globe. We offer a range of services such as cloud computing, advertising, FinTech, and other enterprise services to support our clients' digital transformation and business growth.

About Level Infinite
Level Infinite is a global gaming brand dedicated to delivering high-quality and engaging interactive entertainment experiences to a worldwide audience, wherever and however they choose to play. It operates from bases in Amsterdam and Singapore with staff around the world.
To learn more about Level Infinite, visit www.levelinfinite.com, and follow on Twitter,Facebook, Instagram and YouTube.
Level Infinite is seeking a Senior Communications Manager to organise and manage our worldwide content, coverage, social media and community-building/influencer efforts. We need someone who can work with multiple teams, internal stakeholders and game studios to pull together the videos, articles, podcasts, creatives, visuals and other digital content that helps us tell our Level Infinite brand story to the outside world and for our game-development studios.

You’ll need to be highly organized, creating content and social media/community schedules and plans, making assignments for various teams and events, commissioning freelancers to produce written, visual and audio content. Previous experience dealing with vendors and agencies is important. This job is best-suited to a former desk editor, social media or community head at a media or content-focused company. Deadlines will vary for each event, activity or assignment, so you’ll have to be efficient and unflappable in dealing with requests and issues related to stakeholders all over the world. Ours is a rapidly growing unit that requires you to step up, pivot deftly, punch above your weight and achieve results, regardless of circumstances. You will be expected to create or enforce structures, systems and processes and help the Head of Communications, social media, community and brand teams maintain quality standards so that the stories of our brand can be told clearly and vividly across multiple channels.

Key Responsibilities:
Organise our top-quality content services and beam our capabilities to multiple business teams, including development, publishing, branding, technology and others
Work closely with internal units and stakeholders to craft content plans for events
Collaborate with the communications team, business teams and branding team to craft and execute their content plans and help them with their longer-term strategic content-planning support for owned, earned and paid media, including but not limited to websites, press releases, game reviews, trailers, conferences etc. 
Actively identify gaps in and opportunities for our messaging and storytelling, proposing and implementing changes at both the branding and game project levels across multiple owned channels
Build and maintain a strong collaboration network with partners from agencies/production companies and vendors
Work Location: Singapore-CapitalSpring | Hong Kong

RecruitPostName: TiMi G1 Montreal – Animateur Technique Principal/Principal Technical Animator
Responsibility:
TiMi Montréal est une nouvelle équipe de développement AAA créant un jeu de rôle innovant en monde ouvert dans Unreal Engine 5 qui fait partie du groupe primé TiMi Studio Group et Tencent. L’équipe principale du studio a une expérience éprouvée dans la réalisation de jeux à succès en monde ouvert, notamment Assassin’s Creed, Far Cry et Watch Dogs. Il s’agit d’une équipe ambitieuse qui aspire à être un studio phare pour TiMi, atteignant un public mondial de joueurs passionnés qui apprécient la culture optimiste et inclusive du studio qui récompense le développement de jeux de rupture et de prise de risque.
Responsabilités :
Le groupe primé TiMi Studio Group est à la recherche d’un animateur technique principal pour le développement d’un jeu en monde ouvert AAA basé sur une nouvelle propriété intellectuelle. Le projet sera diffusé sur plusieurs plateformes en utilisant la dernière technologie d’Unreal. En tant qu’animateur technique principal, votre rôle sera de développer des pipelines de création de contenu et des fonctionnalités qui soutiennent notre direction d’animation.
TiMi Montréal est un nouveau studio au sein de TiMi Studio Group, une filiale de Tencent Games. Nous sommes passionnés par la création de mondes attrayants que les joueurs pourront explorer pendant de nombreuses années. Cherchez-vous à repousser les limites de ce que les jeux peuvent réaliser visuellement? Êtes-vous passionné par la combinaison de l’art et de la technologie? Alors, rejoignez-nous dans notre ambitieux projet.
Quel sera votre rôle?
L’animateur technique principal travaille en collaboration avec le directeur de l’animation, le directeur de l’animation technique et les programmeurs pour définir et créer les pipelines nécessaires à la production de contenu d’animation de haute qualité. Ils offrent des conseils et un soutien à une équipe d’animateurs, en identifiant les améliorations technologiques qui maximisent la qualité, la performance et l’efficacité. Ils sont à l’aise de travailler dans un environnement hautement collaboratif et novateur.
Développez un pipeline de production de contenu d’animation évolutif et des outils qui soutiennent notre vision créative.
Configurez et soyez le propriétaire de la fonctionnalité des graphiques d’animation de jouabilité.
Établissez des règles et des lignes directrices pour la production de contenu d’animation.
Produisez des références visuelles qui font avancer la technologie et maximisent la qualité.
Collaborez avec l’équipe de programmation pour guider le développement des fonctionnalités, agir comme un pont entre les programmeurs de jouabilité et les animateurs.
Soutenez une équipe d’animateurs pour créer du contenu de manière efficace et cohérente.
Définissez des budgets de performance pour des composants spécifiques du jeu.
Profilez et optimisez les performances sur console/PC.
Rédigez et gérez la documentation technique.
Développez des plans de test robustes en collaboration avec l’équipe d’assurance qualité.
Quel profil cherchons-nous?
Au moins six ans d’expérience professionnelle en développement de jeux AAA. 
Au moins deux titres AAA en monde ouvert produits dans la génération actuelle de consoles.
Forte maîtrise technique des outils et de la technologie de développement de jeux.
Maîtrise de Motion Builder, Maya et 3DS Max.
Excellente compréhension de la production, de l’intégration et de la validation de contenu d’animation.
Joueur d’équipe, hautement collaboratif et axé sur les résultats.
Bonnes compétences en communication et en présentation.
Autonome et proactif pour développer des solutions hautement efficaces.
Curieux d’apprendre et de mettre en œuvre de nouvelles technologies basées sur les tendances du secteur.
Une expérience de développement et d’extension avec Unreal Engine 4 est un plus. 
Qu’est-ce que ça vous rapporte?
Développez des jeux qui améliorent la qualité de divertissement pour un public mondial et font une impression sur l’ensemble du secteur. Rejoignez un studio avec une équipe ambitieuse, talentueuse et expérimentée travaillant dans un environnement optimiste et inclusif. Créez de nouveaux mondes à explorer, expérimenter et apprécier en rejoignant une équipe qui s’intéresse à l’innovation et qui et veut ravir les joueurs avec une nouvelle conception de jeu créative pour des expériences en monde ouvert. Aidez à créer le prochain grand monde de jeu dans lequel les joueurs pourront s’immerger pendant des décennies. 

Award-winning TiMi Studio Group seeks a Senior Technical Animator to develop a AAA, open-world game based on a new IP. The project will be released on multiple platforms using Unreal’s latest technology. As a Senior Technical Animator, your role will be to develop content creation pipelines and features that support our animation direction.
TiMi Montreal is a new studio within TiMi Studio Group, a subsidiary of Tencent Games. We are passionate about creating compelling worlds for players to explore for years to come. Are you looking to push the boundaries of what games can achieve visually? Are you passionate about the combination of art and technology? Then, come join us in our ambitious endeavor.

What will you do?

The Senior Technical Animator works in collaboration with the Animation Director, Technical Animation Director and Programmers to define and create the pipelines needed to produce high quality animation content. They offer guidelines and support for a team of animators, identifying technological improvements that maximize quality, performance and efficiency. They are comfortable working in a highly collaborative and innovative environment.

Develop scalable animation content production pipeline and tools that support our creative vision

Set up and be the feature owner of gameplay animation graphs

Establish rules and guidelines for animation content production

Produce visual benchmarks that push technology forward and maximize quality

Collaborate with programming team to guide feature development, act as a bridge between Gameplay Programmers and Animators

Support a team of animators to build content efficiently and consistently

Define performance budgets for specific components of the game

Profile and optimize performance on console/PC

Write and maintain technical documentation

Develop robust test plans in collaboration with QA team

What we’re looking for?
At least six years of professional AAA game development experience 

At least two AAA open world titles shipped in the current generation of consoles

Strong technical proficiency with game development tools and technology

Mastery of Motion Builder, Maya and 3DS Max

Excellent understanding of animation content production, integration and validation

Team player, highly collaborative and results oriented

Good communication and presentation skills

Autonomous and proactive to develop highly efficient solutions

Curious about learning and implementing new technologies based on industry trends

Experience developing in and extending Unreal Engine 4 a plus 


What is in it for you?
Create AAA multi-platform games with ample resources and support: Bring incredible game ideas to players around the world with the support of one of the most successful studios in the world. TiMi has developed some of the most popular games worldwide and is looking for talented individuals to join it in making another major hit.
Develop for global audiences and make an impression on the entire industry: Join TiMi in making games as part of an ambitious, talented, and seasoned team.
Create new worlds for players to explore, experience and enjoy: Join a team who cares about innovation and wants to delight players with new creative game design for open world experiences. Help create the next great game world for players to immerse in for decades to come. 
Work Location: Canada-Quebec-Remote

RecruitPostName: Senior User Researcher
Responsibility:
Overview
Tencent is creating a new User Research lab in central London, and we are seeking an experienced user researcher to get us started. This is an exciting opportunity to help build a games user research lab and function from the ground up and working with a range of studios and titles. You will play a key role informing how the user research should be conducted and setting the culture for how the team should operate.
Joining Tencent Games, you will be part of a dynamic and growing company that plays a crucial aspect in delivery towards Tencent’s ‘Tech-for-Good’ focused strategy. You will work alongside award winning studios, making some of the most popular games in the world; your mission is to work with these studios and support them with research-informed insights about player behaviour and experience during the development lifecycle and beyond.
If you are passionate about delivering unparalleled consumer experiences and pushing the boundaries of entertainment, we invite you to join our mission and help us deliver the next generation of cutting-edge games and witness your work improving the experience of millions of users!

What You Will Be Doing

RecruitPostName: Senior Government Affairs Manager
Responsibility:
Job Title: Senior Government Affairs Manager
[Company Introduction]
Tencent is a world-leading internet and technology company that develops innovative products and services to improve the quality of life of people around the world. Founded in 1998 with its headquarters in Shenzhen China, our guiding principle is to use technology for good.
We are not only a major video game publisher in the world, we also produce other high-quality digital content, enriching interactive entertainment experiences for people around the globe. We offer a range of services such as cloud computing, advertising, FinTech, and other enterprise services to support our clients' digital transformation and business growth.

IEG

Interactive Entertainment Group (IEG) is responsible for the R&D, operation, and development of the company's interactive entertainment business including games and eSports. Through online gaming, live broadcasts, and offline eSports, IEG assists the company in leading the global interactive entertainment market to create better interactive entertainment content experiences for users.

Job description 
As part of a critical MENA leadership team for minimum 5 years with 10 to 15 years collective experience in working in Saudi Arabia, you must show a broad appreciation of all aspects of publishing operations and Business development in mobile gaming to achieve Tencent’s goals in coordination with different department leads across multiple stakeholders in a global framework. This include Develop and maintain effective relationships with all federal and government officials, Manage a team of 3-6 direct report and be responsible for the output of the departments resources, Advocates for, and manages, policy issues and leads the company’s engagement and campaign with senior internal stakeholders related to government affairs on priority issues, strategies, and/or programs.

Develop and maintain effective relationships with all federal and government officials.
Provides advice to Senior management and leadership with strategic planning for known and potential regulatory activities related to the business and industry.
Develop relationships with various public officials, Provide operational support to all legislative processes to ensure compliance and implement all public policies to achieve all objectives.
Contributes to Identify, develop, and evaluate business strategy, based on company’s growth objectives.
Establish and maintain strong relationships with local partners to optimize the potential business.
Work Location: Saudi Arabia-Riyadh

RecruitPostName: Senior IT  Analyst, Workday (HCM/Recruiting/Compensation/Absence)
Responsibility:
Position Overview:

Tencent Overseas IT has the mission to empower Tencent’s rapid global growth with future ready, global IT platforms, applications and services. We are chartered to lead the Overseas IT strategy, architecture, roadmap and execution. Satisfying our internal/external customers and becoming a world class global IT team are our top aspirations.

We believe this is a critical component to enable Tencent’s rapid employee and business growth in Overseas market, including North and South America, Europe, Middle East and Asia (Except Greater China).

• Work closely with business partners to understand business processes, goals and gaps.
• Facilitate review sessions with functional owners, subject matter experts and end-user representatives
• Provide Solutions options for the business to consider, along with pros and cons for each option and recommendation
• Drive the design, configuration and deployment of new projects & system enhancements
• Participate in the change management and go live support processes.
Work Location: US-Palo Alto

About Tencent
Tencent is an Internet-based platform company founded in Shenzhen, China, in 1998. We use technology to enrich the lives of Internet users and assist the digital upgrade of enterprises. With over 1.2 billion users worldwide, WeChat is changing the mobile landscape by connecting people, services, and businesses in China and around-the world. The WeChat team in Singapore is responsible for managing and growing our core product including messaging and social networking for users around the world (excluding the Chinese mainland).

Roles & Responsibilities
- Promote the launch of WeChat payment with local overseas merchants.
- Integrate and coordinate internal and external resources, develop offline institutional service providers, and continuously increase the market share of WeChat payment.
- Innovative cooperation, export industry solutions, set benchmarks, and enhance WeChat payment abroad market influence.
Work Location: Thailand-Bangkok

RecruitPostName: WeChat Payのシニアエリアマネージャー
Responsibility:
WeChat Payは人民元から円への精算を提供することで、WeChatユーザーはWeChat Payを通じて通貨を交換することなく加盟店舗で買い物をすることができ、海外でよりスマートで便利なショッピングを体験できます。WeChat Payは、日本の加盟店をより良くサポートし、中国の訪問者にサービスを提供し、オープンプラットフォームでの加盟店のパフォーマンスを向上させることを目指しています。
WeChat Payは、全国の主要なデパート、レストラン、観光名所、コンビニエンスストア、および空港で使用可能です。
現在WeChat Payのクロスボーダービジネスは、中国本土以外の64の国と地域で承認された支払いサービスを提供し、24を超える通貨をサポートしています。 WeChat Payは、スマートライフのコンセプトを世界に紹介することを目標に、中国市場を超えて拡大を続ける予定です。

1.主な目標は、日本のWeChat決済加盟店の効果的なカバレッジと市場シェアを改善することです。
2.日本のビジネス形態、加盟店、開拓チャネルの完全な理解に基づいて、市場機会を発見し、WeChatとTencentのリソースを統合し、地域拡販計画を策定し、エグゼキューションを効果的に実施します。
3.日本におけるWeChat Payの健全な発展を達成するために、地域のサービスプロバイダーおよびパートナーの管理および事業開発を実施します。
Work Location: Japan-Tokyo-Shibuya

Responsibility:
About the job
Tencent is a world-leading internet and technology company that develops innovative products and services to improve the quality of life of people around the world. Founded in 1998 with its headquarters in Shenzhen China, our guiding principle is to use technology for good.

We are not only a major video game publisher in the world, we also produce other high-quality digital content, enriching interactive entertainment experiences for people around the globe. We offer a range of services such as cloud computing, advertising, FinTech, and other enterprise services to support our clients' digital transformation and business growth.

About The Team
Dedicating to intelligent game marketing technology and innovative gaming solutions, the Value-added Service department provides professional support and services in elevating operational performance for numerous games, creating abundant game content and diversified entertainment experience and for Tencent game players across the globe.

The department strives to provide world-leading solutions, including game mall services - GMall, game native technology - small app engine and PIXUI, game marketing platform - AMS and Lingxi, innovative UI engine technology and many others, winning recognitions and awards from the company and the industry.

In 2022, we commit to the development of marketing capability for games, and support the successful commercialization tactics with 4000+ tailored campaigns for over 200 games, including worldwide renowned franchises like Honor of Kings, Peace Elite, PUBG mobile and many others.

At the same time, with the continuous enhancement, our system is capable in dealing with queries at the level of hundreds of billions. Together with the talents specialized in client-side, front-side, background-side, cloud native and many other fields, the department is empowered to cover comprehensive roadmap from research, design, development, operation and maintenance.

Join us, join the Value-added Services Department! Unleash your potential, and together provide the joyful experience for Tencent players across the Global players.

Responsibilities
Responsible for high-quality and efficient delivery/change of supporting SRE/Devops work.
Responsible for the ability to quickly troubleshoot system defects and debug online problems.
Responsible for the construction of DevOps platform, improving development efficiency through research on new technologies.
Establish automated, intelligent operation and maintenance support tools/platforms.
Promote R&D and product team to improve architecture system design from DevOps’ perspectives, optimizing resource utilization and technical architecture.

Tencent Overseas IT has the mission to empower Tencent’s rapid global growth with future ready, global IT platforms, applications and services. RecruitPostName: Senior Devops Engineer
Responsibility:
Position Overview:
We are seeking a Sr. DevOps Engineer with extensive cloud and DevOps experience on at least one of the major public cloud platforms.
Duties and Responsibilities
This senior role will closely work with our internal IT and cloud providers to design and build automated solutions, operational processes and monitoring system for Cloud Enabled Studio products and services with paradigm of Infrastructure as Code (IaC). This role will also support the studio’s legacy infrastructure and its evolution to the cloud. Our customers include internal or acquired gaming studios, innovative offices/workplaces, various business groups and external customers. The work scope will include understanding the internal customers’ business requirements, collecting the technical requirements, developing reference architecture and prototypes based on leading industry best practice, leading implementation, and deployment for global locations, as well as issue troubleshooting when necessary.
For this job, you will:
•    Standardize and automate the provisioning and support aspects as reusable cloud services and interfaces 
•    Develop infrastructure as code on public cloud (Tencent Cloud / AWS / Azure / GCP) using best practices and implementations for non-production and production environments 
•    Implement automated configuration and deployment process towards improving functionality, availability, and manageability of our Cloud Enabled Studio services 
•    Lead technical operations on key initiatives or projects from requirements to design to implementation 
•    Ensure the availability, performance, reliability, and reporting of services
•    Improve productivity in delivery orchestration, proactive monitoring, self-healing automation, and operations validations 
•    Design, implement and support operational and reliability aspects of large-scale Cloud-enabled studio with focus on performance at scale, real time monitoring, logging, and alerting
•    Develop operational alerts, perform alert investigation and develop response runbooks
•    Develop Elasticsearch ingest pipelines, Kibana dashboards, and canvases
•    Solve problems related to these mission critical services and build automation to proactively detect and prevent their re-occurrences 
•    Collaborate via open communication reaching across functional borders to analyze, tune, and configure automated platform infrastructure and systems
Based in Palo Alto, CA, this person will work closely with the global IT team, HQ teams.  
 
Work Location: US-Palo Alto

RecruitPostName: IT Engineer Intern 5436912002
Responsibility:
About Tencent
Founded in November, 1998, Tencent is a leading provider of Internet value added services in China. Since its establishment, Tencent has maintained steady growth under its user-oriented operating strategies. On June 16, 2004, Tencent Holdings Limited (SEHK 700) went public on the main board of the Hong Kong Stock Exchange. Tencent is focused on bringing high-quality and engaging internet services and entertainment to its users. In China, Tencent is the largest publisher of online games and we work together with world-renown developers such as Activision, Epic Games, Halfbrick Studios, King, and Riot Games.

About Our Team
Tencent Overseas IT aims to empower its rapid global growth with future-ready, global IT platforms, applications, and services. We are chartered to lead the Overseas IT strategy, architecture, roadmap, and execution. Our top aspirations are to satisfy our internal/external customers and become a world-class global IT team.

We seek a passionate IT Engineer Intern to work closely with our Overseas IT and various business teams. This position will promote OIT products & events by unlocking the potential of digital graphic technology. Our IT team aims to provide the best DAY 1 experience for new Tencent employees and daily experience for all users.

Primary Responsibilities
● Collaborate with HR, Admin and Training team to provide the best DAY 1 experience for new Tencent employees, as well as daily experience.
● Collaborate with global IT team to standardize employee Hardware/Software, streamline procurement/shipping process, and establish Overseas IT Asset management.
● Oversee the maintenance, repair or replacement of computer units or other technological components.
● Communicate with customers to identify their requirement and ensure their needs are met, provide follow up services to ensure customer satisfaction and resolve client issues.
● Properly escalate unresolved issues according to Overseas IT Escalation Process.
● Manage PC setup and deployment for new employees, develop automation to create optimized Windows/macOS images, updated as needed.
● Consolidate overseas IT knowledge documents in one place for overseas users’ self-help and regional peer support.
● Align with continuous improvement program focused on business value, process optimization, cost avoidance, cost reductions and IT “Speed to Market.”
